name: frogdate
description:
game made for the Narrative Jam #7 v_v

note that this Does have some bugs and glitches there and there, will do an update to fix those soon enough..! ran out of time there and there aha (specifically I want to point out that talking to the body guard in deeper forest may make it impossible to continue: so please save before you do that)

everything else either from the RPGMaker VX Ace RTP or Meeeee :3
